1.0.name: wordpress/mf-plus-wpml
1.0.description: MF Plus WPML fixes compatibility issues that existed between Magic Fields and WPML, it also enables you to choose which custom fields will stay sincronized between languages so you will only have to translate those contents which are really required.

1.1.name: wordpress/mf-plus-wpml
